markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kneel for No God](/Feats.aspx?ID=974) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 21 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Ancient-Blooded Dwarf](/Heritages.aspx?ID=1) heritage

**Access**
Vahird ethnicity

</column>

---

Your ancestors’ defiance of magic and your people’s strictly egalitarian mindset mean that certain forms of magic have little effect on you. When you use your [Call on Ancient Blood](/Actions.aspx?ID=1) reaction against a divine spell and roll a critical failure on the saving throw against that spell, you get a failure instead.
name: Kneel for No God
